BitStatus.Label: Soft Start Timeout
BitStatus.Description: Status bit to flag a soft start timeout condition.

BitStatus.Label: Thermal Shutdown
BitStatus.Description: Status bit to flag a thermal shutdown condition.

BitStatus.Label: Disconnect Over Current
BitStatus.Description: Status bit to flag a disconnect switch over current condition

BitStatus.Label: Secondary Current Limit
BitStatus.Description: Status bit to flag a secondary current limit condition.

BitStatus.Label: Charge-Pump Over Voltage
BitStatus.Description: Status bit to flag a charge pump capacitor over voltage condition.

BitStatus.Label: VX Under Voltage
BitStatus.Description: Status bit to flag a VX node under voltage condition.

BitStatus.Label: VX Over Voltage
BitStatus.Description: Status bit to flag a VX node over voltage condition.

BitStatus.Label: Output Under Voltage
BitStatus.Description: Status bit to flag a output under voltage condition.

BitStatus.Label: Output Over Voltage
BitStatus.Description: Status bit to flag a output over voltage condition.

BitStatus.Label: LED Short
BitStatus.Description: An LED SHORT condition was detected on one or more strings. Once set this bit will stay set until the STATUS2 register is read.

BitStatus.Label: LED Open
BitStatus.Description: An LED OPEN condition was detected on one or more strings. Once set this bit will stay set until the STATUS2 register is read.

Option.Label: 3 x charge pump step up ratio
2 x charge pump step up ratio

List.Label: FPWM Mode
List.Description: Fixed-Frequency mode select (only valid if PFM Mode=0).

AutoList.Label: Fade Speed
AutoList.Description: Set the fading counter from 50us to 12.75ms in 50us steps. This is the period between each intensity step.

List.Label: PWM Output Transition
List.Description: Transition point between PWM dimming and analog dimming.

Slider.Label: LED Intensity
Slider.Description: Sets the LEDs intensity. Calculates brightness from 0% to 100%.

Bit.Name: RESET
Bit.Description: Resets the device to the default state.

Bit.Name: PWM_IX1
Bit.Description: Transition point between PWM dimming and analog dimming.

Bit.Name: PWM_IX0
Bit.Description: Transition point between PWM dimming and analog dimming.
